page.title: 13A DAY IN MY LIFE - MORNING
page.content: During the{school}week I get up at 7 o'clock and get washed and dressed, arriving dowstairs just in time to watch{Popeye the Sailorman}on {television}as I have my{breakfast}of {cornflakes, milk}and{toast.} My mum gives me my{packed lunch of{sandwiches, yohurt, biscuit}and an{apple.}I check my bag to make sure I've got everything I need for school. On the way to school I usually call at the shop to buy some{sweets}and {crisps. }When I get into the {playground}I play with my friends until the bell goes. Everyone lines up in classes and waits to be sent in by a member of staff. On the way to the{classroom}we stop at the cloakroom to put our coats away and change our shoes ready for {Assembly}in the hall.
